book.title: Capture Pricing eOffer Training
book.body:
What is the New Capture Pricing Section?

Previously, you would enter pricing information using manual entry into a spreadsheet without a way to validate your information or check for errors.

Now, with the Capture Pricing section, you will have three options for entering pricing data that provide a streamlined process spanning both eOffer and eMod.

This new method offers a more intelligent pricing template that captures a more detailed picture of your pricing structure and provides feedback on the data you enter into the system, ultimately reducing errors in submission.
